About usFAQsArticlesLoginAbout usWelcome to DOCalertWelcome to DOCalert, India’s trusted patient management and growth platform for doctors, clinics, and hospitals.At DOCalert, our mission is simple — to help healthcare professionals grow their practice, improve patient satisfaction, and make clinic management easy for everyone.We provide a user-friendly system designed so that even individuals with minimal education or technical skills can operate it effortlessly. Whether you run a large hospital or a small clinic, DOCalert is built to support your growth.Our Key Features:✔️ Patient Records Made Easy: Quickly record essential patient details like name, phone number, and next appointment.✔️ Instant OPD Slips: Generate OPD slips instantly for a smooth and organized check-in process.✔️ WhatsApp Review System: Automatically send review links to patients via WhatsApp after each consultation.✔️ Executive Call Support: Our team reminds patients of their appointments a day in advance via phone calls.✔️ Growth Analysis & Doctor Feedback: Our expert team analyzes your practice growth and informs you of any issues to ensure continuous improvement.✔️ Recognition for Excellence: Doctors who receive all positive feedback are rewarded with special gifts or medals.✔️ Billing with or without GST: Generate bills easily with support for both GST and non-GST billing options.✔️ Google Reviews for More Patients: We encourage happy patients to leave positive Google reviews, helping doctors increase their online presence and attract more patients through word-of-mouth referrals.Simple, Accessible, Powerful:DOCalert is designed to be so simple that even a 10th-pass student or someone with minimal technical knowledge can use it effectively.We offer two plans:Free Plan: Includes patient record management, OPD slip generation, and billing.Paid Subscription: Unlocks full features including call support, growth analysis, review collection, patient reminders, and more.Why It Works:According to our expert research, word of mouth remains a powerful tool in healthcare growth. By reminding patients of their appointments and engaging them with feedback systems, patients remember the doctor's name and recommend them to others, boosting practice growth naturally.Join Us:Join over 6,700+ doctors and clinics across India who trust DOCalert to simplify clinic management and increase patient growth.© 2025 Artif Software.
